item.description: Hello there! I am Max. I am a software developer, currently working mostly with TypeScript, React and Node ecosystems. I write a blog about topics that interest me most: programming languages in general, TypeScript, testing, writing and other great stuff.

Hello there! I am Max. I am a software developer, currently working mostly with TypeScript, React and Node ecosystems. I write a blog about topics that interest me most: programming languages in general, TypeScript, testing, writing and other great stuff.

item.title: About me
item.description: About me Max Kovalevskii, a software developer This is my website - the place where I share information and knowledge about topics that interest me with everyone and myself. A software developer who wants to teach you everything about amazing technology such as Go (Golang) and more. I write blog posts and make courses about topics that interest me most: Go (Golang), Command-Line Interface (CLI) Applications, TUIs, Linux, Git, Docker, Vim (Neovim), Kubernetes (k8s), TDD, note-taking and other great stuff.

item.title: My Digital Garden
item.description: Welcome to my Digital Garden! This is the place where I share my knowledge with everyone on the Web and with myself. Notes are drafts or pre-complete materials that I could use for writing articles on my blog. I take notes following Zettelkasten method and I use Obsidian app for this. Some notes might contain a format that is working in Obsidian well but could be not supported by my website (yet).
